    • PlayingDecks

      public PlayingDecks(ResourceCard resourceCardOne, ResourceCard resourceCardTwo, GoldCard goldCardOne, GoldCard goldCardTwo, Objective commonObjectiveOne, Objective commonObjectiveTwo, Deck resourceCardDeck, Deck goldCardDeck, Deck starterCardDeck, Deck objectiveDeck)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      resourceCardOne - :the first resource card on the field that you can take
      resourceCardTwo - :the second resource card on the field that you can take
      goldCardOne - :the first gold card on the field that you can take
      goldCardTwo - :the second gold card on the field that you can take
      commonObjectiveOne - :the first objective card on the field
      commonObjectiveTwo - :the second objective card on the field
      resourceCardDeck - :resource card deck
      goldCardDeck - :gold card deck
      starterCardDeck - :starter card deck(this deck will not be available through the game)
      objectiveDeck - :objective card deck
